org.cpsolver.studentsct.reservation

Class Restriction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.studentsct.reservation.Restriction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CourseRestriction, CurriculumRestriction, IndividualRestriction

    public abstract class Restriction
extends Object
    Abstract restriction. Restrictions are like reservations, that must be used and that do not reserve any space. Except, there can be more than one restriction on an offering and the student must meet at least one that applies to her/him.

    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
    Copyright (C) 2007 - 2020 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org

    Author:
    Tomáš Müller
